feed.title: Apple Quickening Pace Of Moving Production Out Of China: Report - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL )
feed.summary: Following recent protests at Apple Inc's AAPL iPhone factory in China over strict COVID rules and unpaid dues, the company is quickening the pace of its plans to move production out of the country.
